TopicTitle: Hype Train 1.0.5: The Local Train Route

Articles.Content: Fortunately the Hype Train is powered by spent boosters and dead Kerbals. That is to say, this train don't stop.

steamdb says ksp was updated 9 hours ago, but I can't download it :/

Windows users got same thing?

Perhaps worth noting that tonight in the UK it's Guy Fawkes night - the airspace over the UK will be filled with explosions and the ground ablaze with thousands of burning fires.

This is not unlike my KSP save.

steamdb says ksp was updated 9 hours ago, but I can't download it :/

Windows users got same thing?

If I were to guess, I'd say steamdb accounts for updates on any branches, including the ones not available to the general public.

Well, I'm onboard. Speed up a little!
Do the updated hydrodynamics mean it'll be less dangerous to belly-land a spaceplane on water?

Do the updated hydrodynamics mean it'll be less dangerous to belly-land a spaceplane on water?

Must be. Im really excited about it because I'll make some aircraft carriers ^^

(btw from my experiences, War thunder and ksp mostly get updates in similar times, War thunder got a patch today, so..
I'm onboard
I'm on the roof.
I'm on top of the people on the roof...
I'm getting towed behind the train in a boat...
I'm glad I got here in time!
I'm parking my DeLorean in front of the hypetrain to get it to 80MPH to go to a future where 1.05 is released.

I'm parking my DeLorean in front of the hypetrain to get it to 80MPH to go to a future where 1.05 is released.

Happy landings!
